title: Toast Message
behaviorsList: Toast messages should appear at the bottom-left corner of the screen by default.
Messages should be brief, ideally no more than two lines of text.
Each toast message should auto-dismiss after 5 seconds, unless the user interacts with it.
Toast messages should support different types: success, error, warning, and info, each with distinct colors and icons.
Ensure toast messages are accessible, with ARIA roles and labels for screen readers.
Maximum 5 line can be showen in toast message
A progress weel will indicate how much time is left until the message disappears.
Toast messages should stack vertically if multiple are displayed simultaneously.
Provide a close button on each toast message for manual dismissal.
Messages should slide in from the side and fade out smoothly to enhance the user experience.
Toast messages should not overlap with other UI elements or obstruct important content.
